rainbowReef

Class PopMotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • game2D.controllers.Motion
      • rainbowReef.PopMotion

  • public class PopMotion
extends Motion
    PopMotion controls motion of pop. It calculates pop's location in the next frame based on pop's current location, speed and gravity. Gravity gradually increases pop's y speed until it reaches a maximum. PopMotion also calculates pop's new direction after bouncing with wall, blocks and katch.
    Author:
    Fudou

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(int steps)
        Moves pop after each clock tick. It first calculates changes in y speed based on gravity, then updates popLoc
        Overrides:
        move in class Motion
        Parameters:
        steps - The steps to move. Each step moves object one speed unit.

      • bounce

        public void bounce(GameObject obj,
                   java.awt.Rectangle intersect)
        Updates pop speed after collision with wall, blocks and katch
        Parameters:
        obj - The object pop bounces against
        intersect - The intersection between pop and the other object, returned by Pop.collision()
